verse.roman:
vidhisāraḥ sutas tasyā-
jātaśatrur bhaviṣyati
darbhakas tat-suto bhāvī
darbhakasyājayaḥ smṛtaḥ

synonyms: vidhisāraḥ—Vidhisāra; sutaḥ—the son; tasya—of Kṣetrajña; ajātaśatruḥ—Ajātaśatru; bhaviṣyati—will be; darbhakaḥ—Darbhaka; tat-sutaḥ—the son of Ajātaśatru; bhāvī—will take birth; darbhakasya—of Darbhaka; ajayaḥ—Ajaya; smṛtaḥ—is remembered.
translation: The son of Kṣetrajña will be Vidhisāra, and his son will be Ajātaśatru. Ajātaśatru will have a son named Darbhaka, and his son will be Ajaya.
